author: A_Brickset_user
title: King of the Road
review: One of the longest town vehicles ever released (almost a roadplate in length). It was also one of the best designed, with the "Gull Wing" trailer doors providing easy access to the storage space. From memory, the International Transport stickers weren't symmetrical and the truck looked a little ugly but those quibbles aside, it was lovely addition to a Town line up that was rapidly beginning to expand.
